ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.10'

about.description:
The goal of `pyvo` is allow astronomers and tool developers to access data
and services from remote archives and other web resources.  It takes
advantage VO standards to give access to thousands of catalogs, data
archives, information services, and analysis tools.  It also takes
advantage of the general capabilities of Astopy (and numpy), and so a
secondary goal is to provide a development platform for migrating more VO
capabilities into Astropy.
about.summary: Astropy affiliated package for accessing Virtual Observatory data and services

about.description:
The goal of `pyvo` is allow astronomers and tool developers to access data
and services from remote archives and other web resources.  It takes
advantage VO standards to give access to thousands of catalogs, data
archives, information services, and analysis tools.  It also takes
advantage of the general capabilities of Astopy (and numpy), and so a
secondary goal is to provide a development platform for migrating more VO
capabilities into Astropy.
about.summary: Astropy affiliated package for accessing Virtual Observatory data and services

name: pyvo
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "pyvo" %}
{% set version = "1.8.1" %}
{% set python_min = "3.9" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: d3cc60aa3d3416d22c89e465a04dfa9f521085fdd5228cce2cffd2fee3a9e709

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - setuptools_scm
    - setuptools
    - pip
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - astropy-base >=4.2
    - requests

test:
  requires:
    - python {{ python_min }}
  imports:
    - pyvo
    - pyvo.dal
    - pyvo.registry
    - pyvo.io
    - pyvo.utils

about:
  home: http://pyvo.readthedocs.io/
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: licenses/LICENSE.rst
  summary: Astropy affiliated package for accessing Virtual Observatory data and services
  description: |
    The goal of `pyvo` is allow astronomers and tool developers to access data
    and services from remote archives and other web resources.  It takes
    advantage VO standards to give access to thousands of catalogs, data
    archives, information services, and analysis tools.  It also takes
    advantage of the general capabilities of Astopy (and numpy), and so a
    secondary goal is to provide a development platform for migrating more VO
    capabilities into Astropy.
  doc_url: http://pyvo.readthedocs.io/
  dev_url: https://github.com/astropy/pyvo

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - mwcraig
    - bsipocz
    - funbaker
    - RayPlante
    - cbanek
    - andamian
    - jcsegovia
